greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, where row (n) = n mod (n-1), n mod (n-2), n mod (n-3), ...n mod 2.
comment: Central terms: a(2*n+1,n) = n for n > 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 03 2014
Deleting column 1 of the array at A055126 gives the array A051778 in square format (see Example).   - _Clark Kimberling_, Feb 04 2016
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=3..125 of triangle, flattened
xref: Cf. A004125 (row sums), A000027 (central terms), A049820 (number of nonzeros per row), A032741 (number of ones per row), A070824 (number of zeros per row).
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Dec 09 1999
